QuestData.Title: In Search of Suna
QuestData.Description: I have bad news. When I returned, Suna was already gone.$B$BThe others say that she took her things and headed down the road to the east, muttering about hunting down the source of the yaungol aggression.$B$BI cannot allow her to venture into dangerous territory alone.$B$BI've already prepared a group of soldiers to push further east.$B$BWe are leaving shortly. Hop on the caravan if you wish to travel with the Shado-Pan. You can also meet us there if you wish.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Ban Bearheart after arriving at Hatred's Vice.
